mapper.sql: id, orgid, cellphone, memberid, membername, remark, creater, createtime, upter, upttime
mapper.select:
select
from file_org_signer
and orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cellphone like "%" #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and membername like "%" #{membername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
order by createtime desc
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(0) from file_org_signer
and orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cellphone like "%" #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and membername like "%" #{membername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
